patthana15.82:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.82:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo
patthana15.82:1.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
patthana15.82:2.1_1: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo
patthana15.82:2.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:3.1: Araṇaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
